name: Smash Birds 2: Best of Fun for Boys Girls and Kids
name_original: Smash Birds 2: Best of Fun for Boys Girls and Kids
description:
Are you tired of the birds? If the answer is Yes then Smash them, Smash them all.

Simply tap anywhere in the screen and smash them all the birds before they reach the end of the Screen earning the highest score possible.

Lots of fun, action, good music and sound.
